job.description:
We are seeking an experienced Full-Stack Engineer to join our innovative team. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in modern web technologies including React, Node.js, TypeScript, and cloud platforms.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement scalable web applications using React and Next.js
- Build RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express
- Work with PostgreSQL and MongoDB databases
- Deploy and manage applications on AWS/Azure
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams using Agile methodologies
- Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
- Implement CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices

Required Skills:
- 5+ years of professional software development experience
- Expert-level proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript
- Strong experience with React, Next.js, and modern frontend frameworks
- Solid backend development skills with Node.js
- Database design and optimization (PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
- RESTful API design and implementation
- Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
- Git version control and collaborative development
- Strong problem-solving and communication skills

Preferred:
- Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
- Knowledge of microservices architecture
- Familiarity with GraphQL
- Open source contributions
- CS degree or equivalent experience
